f3f95291-9273-4d81-86ce-961a48976238.name: Oxygen Storage
f3f95291-9273-4d81-86ce-961a48976238.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

5503d7a7-1ba2-4ecd-9bce-f47dd28858c4.name: Oxygen Storage
5503d7a7-1ba2-4ecd-9bce-f47dd28858c4.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

51a519d7-685b-447b-84a1-82dd1a465eae.name: Oxygen Storage
51a519d7-685b-447b-84a1-82dd1a465eae.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

0e6d7501-86d2-4177-9835-b54eba3a193c.name: Oxygen Storage
0e6d7501-86d2-4177-9835-b54eba3a193c.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

f0d6184f-9b80-487c-8a0e-c295d71daa06.name: Oxygen Storage
f0d6184f-9b80-487c-8a0e-c295d71daa06.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

e2a3efaa-f483-4223-8e31-bed704252aa3.name: Diffuse
e2a3efaa-f483-4223-8e31-bed704252aa3.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

150283e6-194b-4dda-a65e-164d95e735a7.name: Homogenous
150283e6-194b-4dda-a65e-164d95e735a7.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

2d517f15-55bd-430c-a9ef-3a7ad59891e0.name: No Blood
2d517f15-55bd-430c-a9ef-3a7ad59891e0.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

ab9a5e2b-1bbd-4cdb-83e7-718dab74f0de.name: No Brain
ab9a5e2b-1bbd-4cdb-83e7-718dab74f0de.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

65d56c4c-541a-4e1b-a596-971bcf2ac760.name: No Eyes
65d56c4c-541a-4e1b-a596-971bcf2ac760.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

f0be724e-52e6-4912-a8f6-224032febb43.name: No Head
f0be724e-52e6-4912-a8f6-224032febb43.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

2cafc2e9-0c29-460f-9f58-63a86e31741e.name: No Neck
2cafc2e9-0c29-460f-9f58-63a86e31741e.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

e96bfad9-40bf-4ce9-a205-e71d597357d8.name: No Vitals
e96bfad9-40bf-4ce9-a205-e71d597357d8.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

14a00f89-4aea-4cec-b534-4172074341f3.name: Unliving
14a00f89-4aea-4cec-b534-4172074341f3.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

56b3e0d5-403a-4acb-8dcd-d20ec4473093.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

6d0c1f25-dfa8-44b8-8d4c-f366983147a3.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

8ca584f2-7d3f-4136-9b41-cf67b9bff4cb.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
